text: Codex Sassoon may refer to several different manuscripts or codices collected by David Solomon Sassoon. Notable codices include: * Codex Sassoon 1053, more recently known as Codex S1, a 10th century Hebrew bible which in 2023 was put on commercial auction as the earliest complete Hebrew bible.https://www.sothebys.com/en/buy/auction/2023/codex-sassoon-the-earliest- most-complete-hebrew-bible * Damascus Pentateuch, also known as Codex Sassoon 507, a 10th century copy of the Five Books of Moses. == References == * Ohel Dawid - Descriptive Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the Sassoon Library. Vol. 1â€“2. London: Oxford University Press. . Category:10th- century works
title: Codex Sassoon
